title: Multiplying the Numerator and Denominator
text: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get $$\frac{\left(x^2-4x\right) \left(x+2\right)}{x\left(x^2+5x+6\right)}$$
speech: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get  fraction, parentheses, x squared minus 4 x  times, parentheses x plus 2, , over, x parentheses, x squared plus 5 x plus 6 ,
pacedSpeech: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get   fraction, , x squared minus 4 x  times,  x plus 2, , over, x , x squared plus 5 x plus 6 ,

title: Simplifying if Necessary
text: This fraction can be simplified through factoring. $$\frac{\left(x^2-4x\right) \left(x+2\right)}{x\left(x^2+5x+6\right)}=\frac{x\left(x-4\right) \left(x+2\right)}{x\left(x+3\right) \left(x+2\right)}=\frac{x-4}{x+3}$$
speech: This fraction can be simplified through factoring.  fraction, parentheses, x squared minus 4 x  times, parentheses x plus 2, , over, x parentheses, x squared plus 5 x plus 6 ,  is equal to fraction, x, parentheses x minus 4,  times, parentheses x plus 2, , over, x, parentheses x plus 3,  times, parentheses x plus 2, ,  is equal to fraction, x minus 4, over, x plus 3,
pacedSpeech: This fraction can be simplified through factoring.  this expression
